Name: pan-drmuhamadhabibb-la
Author: Dr. Muhamad Habib, Bhai Harpreet Singh, Maulana Wahiduddin Khan

Translations.Text: Ate uha hi hai jisa ne do dari'avam nu mila'i'a. Iha mitha hai, pi'asa bujha'una vala ate khara hai, kaura hai. Ate usa ne inham de vicakara parada rakha dita hai ate ika paki ota
Ate uha hi hai jisa ne manukha nu pani tom paida kita. Phira usa nu parivara ate sahura (saka sabadhi'am) vala bana'i'a. Ate tuhada raba bahuta takata vala hai
Ate iha alaha nu chada ke ajihi'am cizam nu pujade hana, jihari'am na inham nu labha pahuca sakadi'am hana, na hani. Ate inakari'am ne tam apane raba de virudha saha'ika bani'a ho'i'a hai
Ate asim tuhanu sirafa khusakhabari dena vala ate azaba dena vala bana ke bheji'a hai
Tusim akho, ki maim tuhade tom isa la'i ko'i mazaduri nahim magada. Paratu iha ki jihara cahe apane raba da raha apana lave
Ate jivata alaha te jihara kade marana vala nahi bharosa rakho ate usa di khusi de nala usa di upama karo. Ate uha apane badi'am de papam di khabara rakhana vala kaphi hai
Jisa ne akasam ate dharati nu che dinam vica paida kita ate (usa nu) jihara inham de vicakara hai. Phira uha rahimana arasa te birazamana ho'i'a. Isa la'i usa nu puchom jihara ko'i janada hai
Ate jadom unham nu kiha janda hai ki rahimana nu sijada karo “tam uha akhade hana ki rahimana ki hai. Ki asim usanu sijada kari'e jisa nu tusim akhade ho. Ate unham da thirakana hora vadha janda hai
Ate alaha vadi barakata vala hai. Jisa ne akasam vica bauraja bana'e ate unham vica ika diva (suraja) ate ika camakada ho'i'a cana rakhi'a
Ate uha hi hai jisa ne dinam nu ika tom ba'ada ika a'una vale bana'i'a usa bade la'i, jihara sikhi'a laina cahave ate ahisana mada banana cahave
Ate alaha de bade uha hana, jihare dharati ute nimarata akha dide hana ki tuhanu salama
Ate jihare apane raba de age sijada ate kayama (khare hona) vica ratam batita karade hana
Ate jihare akhade hana, ki he sade raba! Naraka di saza nu sade tom dura rakha. Besaka usa di saza bahuta dukhada'ika hai
Besaka uha bahuta bhaira tikana hai ate bhaira sathana hai
Ate uha loka jadom uha kharaca karade hana, na tam ajamim' uda'unde hana ate na hi uha kajusi karade hana, (sagom) unham va kharaca darami'ana huda hai

Ate jihare loka alaha tom sina kise hora nu pujanika nahim manade ate uha alaha di'am naja'iza (jinha nu marana alaha ne harama kita hai) kite ho'e jiva di hati'a nahim karade, para ja'iza tarike nala. Ate uha vibhacara nahim karade ate jihare bade ajiha kama karanage uha saza de bhagi dara honage
Ki'amata de dina usa di saza vadhadi cali javegi. Ate uha usa vica hamesa be-ijata ho ke rahinage
Paratu jihara bada tauba kare ate imana li'a'e te neka karama kare tam alaha ajihe lokam de gunaham nu neki'am vica badala devega. Alaha mu'afa karana vala ate rahima karana vala hai
Ate jihara bada ho riha hai
Ate jihare loka jhuthi gavahi vica samila nahim' honage ate jadom kise asalila ziza kolom laghana pai jave tam uha sajidagi nala lagha
(jade hana73) ate uha ajihe hana ki jadom naha na unam de ratha di'am galam rahim upadesa dita janda hai “tam uha unham te guge ate anhe ho ke nahim digade
Ate jihare akhade hana ki hai sade raba! Sanu sadi'am patani'am ate sadi aulada valom akham di thadaka bakhasa de ate sanu prahezagaram da agu bana de
Iha (uha) loka hana jinham nu uce mahila milanage. Isa la'i ki unham ne sabara kita. Ate unham vica inham da savagata du'a ate salama de nala hovega
Uha usa vica hamesa rahinage. Uha thahirana da ate rahina da vadhi'a sathana hai
Akho, ki mera raba tuhadi pravaha nahim karada. Jekara tusim usa nu na pukaro. Isa la'i (jekara) tusim jhuthala cuke tam uha ciza jaladi hi vapara ke rahegi
